title: Drawing, 1969-165-458, 1952–69
medium: Orange, pink and blue colored pencil, graphite on white tracing paper
inscribed:
Recto: in graphite upper right, letters "a", "b", "c" written on geometric motifs; in graphite an irregular half circle at the right edge of the missing upper left quadrant

Verso: in graphite lower left corner:  II - 40
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Pattern of alternating bands of small diamonds, triangles and squares
